import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react' import './Navbar.css' import imayllogo from '../../../Assets/imayllogo.png' function Navbar(props) { const [usefc,setUseefc]=useState(true) const roleRefs = { role1: useRef(null), role2: useRef(null), role3: useRef(null), role4: useRef(null), role5: useRef(null), role6: useRef(null), }; const scrollToRole = (role) => { const targetRef = roleRefs[role]; if (targetRef.current) { targetRef.current.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth' }); } setUseefc }; useEffect(() => { props.handleScroll(roleRefs) }, ) return (
scrollToRole('role1')} className='imayl_sub_nav_text_button'> IMAYL EXPERIENCE
scrollToRole('role2')} className='imayl_sub_nav_text_button'> LOG
scrollToRole('role3')} className='imayl_sub_nav_text_button'> TRACK
scrollToRole('role4')} className='imayl_sub_nav_text_button'> DELIEVER
scrollToRole('role5')} className='imayl_sub_nav_text_button'> OUR FEATURES
scrollToRole('role6')} className='imayl_sub_nav_text_button'> MAILROOM
) } export default Navbar
